. thanks for this, sorry for slow response.

so I had to change it a little to run in bash on OS X:

`find . -name '*.coffee' |
xargs -n 1 git log |
grep Author |
egrep -o 'Author:.*' |
sed 's|Author: ||' |
sort |
uniq -c |
sort -n`

and then I got results which indicated only a total of 48 commits for a repo which GitHub says has 576 commits.

having `tally_authors` be in bash is definitely preferable to Ruby — this repo should be very portable and low-overhead — but I'm going to close this Issue in favor of https://github.com/gilesbowkett/rewind/pull/12.
